mapper.select: SELECT f.field_id, f.name, f.addr, f.ind_yn, f.parking_area, f.lat, f.lng, c.court_id, c.name courtName, c.court_type_id, ct.name cTypeName FROM field f LEFT OUTER JOIN court c ON f.field_id=c.field_id LEFT JOIN court_type ct ON c.court_type_id=ct.court_type_id WHERE f.field_type='R' GROUP BY f.field_id;

select f.field_id, f.name, f.addr, f.ind_yn, f.parking_area, f.lat, f.lng, c.court_id, c.name courtName, c.court_type_id, (6371*acos(cos(radians(#{preferLat}))*cos(radians(lat))*cos(radians(lng)-radians(#{preferLng})) +sin(radians(#{preferLat}))*sin(radians(lat)))) AS distance from field f left outer join court c on f.field_id=c.field_id having distance < 2 order by distance DESC;
